description: An API operation for adding tags to a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. Tagging is only supported for directories.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag key-value pairs. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. Key (string) --- The key that is associated with the tag. Value (string) --- The value that is associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key that is associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value that is associated with the tag.
